title: Service contacts
description: View and modify contacts (administrator, technical, billing) associated with your services.

modal.title: Modify a contact
modal.description: Initiate a contact change request. A validation email will be sent to both parties.
modal.newNicHint: Enter the OVH identifier (NIC handle) of the new contact.
modal.success: Request sent! A validation email has been sent to the contacts involved.
